name: SelfPublishing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Self-publish your paperback book, hard cover book, e-book and more. Everyone has a story to tell. When you learn these secrets you will be able to share your knowledge with others and change their lives. Don’t let a lack of knowledge stop you from self-publishing your book. You will learn how to publish your book on Amazon and Kindle. Learn how to self-publish all types of books from children to poetry. Learn the fast, free, inexpensive way to self-publish your book. Learn all this and more.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
